question: What is the title of the first chapter of the Muslim holy book, the Qur’an?Al-Adiyat
explanation: Al-Fatiha is the title of the first chapter of the Muslim holy book, the Qur’an. Al-Fātiḥah is The Opening or The Opener. George Sale translates simply as the Preface, or Introduction) is the first chapter of the Quran.
